Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • AccountBaseUser
      • User

  • public class User
extends AccountBaseUser
    User is a subclass of AccountBaseUser used to provide unique methods and attributes to the user account.

    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String username,
            java.lang.String firstName,
            java.lang.String lastName,
            int telephone,
            java.lang.String address,
            java.lang.String profileImagePath,
            java.lang.Object[] requestedItems,
            int balance)
        Creates a user account.
        Parameters:
        username - The username given to the user.
        firstName - The first name of the user.
        lastName - The last name of the user.
        telephone - The telephone number of the user.
        address - The home address of the user.
        profileImagePath - The file path to the profile image of the user's account.
        requestedItems - An array of all the items requested by the user.
        balance - The account balance in pounds.
